component.name: Aerosols
component.definition: Definition of component type Aerosols required

component.name: AerosolKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type AerosolKeyProperties required

parameter.name: AerosolSchemeScope
parameter.definition: Which atmospheric domains are covered by the aerosol model?

parameter.name: BasicApproximations
parameter.definition: Decription of the basic approximations made in the Aerosol model.

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: What prognostic variables are used by the aerosol model?

value.name: 3D mass/volume mixing ratio for gas species

parameter.name: NumberOfTracers
parameter.definition: Enter the number of tracers in the aerosol model.

parameter.name: FamilyApproach
parameter.definition: Are aerosol calculations generalised into families of species?

component.name: AerosolSpaceConfig
component.definition: Definition of component type AerosolSpaceConfig required

parameter.name: GridConfig
parameter.definition: Definition of property name GridConfig required

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the atmospheric chemistry and aerosols model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the horizontal grid used for atmospheric chemistry and aerosols.

parameter.name: GridConfiguration
parameter.definition: Definition of property name GridConfiguration required

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the vertical grid used for atmospheric chemistry and aerosols.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Total number of vertical levels in atmospheric chemistry and aerosols model.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Mathematical method deployed to solve the evolution of a given variable. If "operator splitting" all the processes are decoupled, the time evolution is calculated sequentially and the tendencies "cumulated". If "integrated" all the processes having an impact on the time evolution are taken into account and solved simultaneously.

constraint.name: if Method is "specific time stepping (operator splitting)"

parameter.name: AdvectionTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for aerosols advection.

parameter.name: PhysicalTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for aerosols physics.

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for the aerosol model

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Specify the type of time step scheme.

parameter.name: 3D-Variables
parameter.definition: 3-Dimensional forcing variables e.g.: U, V, W, T, Q, P, convective mass flux

parameter.name: 2D-Variables
parameter.definition: 2-Dimensional forcing variables e.g. land-sea mask

parameter.name: Frequency
parameter.definition: Frequency with which meteorological forcings are applied

component.name: AerosolTransport
component.definition: Definition of component type AerosolTransport required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Is aerosol transport the same as atmospheric chemistry transport?

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: The type of atmospheric chemistry transport scheme.

parameter.name: MassConservation
parameter.definition: How is mass conservation maintained? i) "mass adjustment": Adjustment is required to conserve mass. ii) "concentration positivity": Negative concentrations are reset. iii) "gradient monotony": Sharp gradients in concentration are smoothed.

parameter.name: Convection
parameter.definition: Convective Transport: i) "convective fluxes connected to tracers": Do tracers "see" convection? ii) "vertical velocities connected to tracers": Are the mass flux vertical velocities connected with tracers in the atmos chemistry scheme?

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Is aerosol turbulence the same as atmospheric chemistry turbulence?

value.name: use same turbulence scheme as AtmosphericChemistry

parameter.name: Scheme
parameter.definition: description of the scheme used for parametrization of the turbulent transport of aerosols.

component.name: AerosolEmissionAndConc
component.definition: Definition of component type AerosolEmissionAndConc required

component.name: Aerosol2D-Sources
component.definition: Definition of component type Aerosol2D-Sources required

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of species emitted by vegetation.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define species emitted by vegetation.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of species emitted by bare ground.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define species emitted by the sea.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: list of species emitted by the sea.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define species emitted by the sea.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of species emitted by human activities at the surface.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define species emitted by human activities at the surface.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

component.name: Aerosol3D-Sources
component.definition: Definition of component type Aerosol3D-Sources required

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of species emitted by aircrafts.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define species emitted by aircraft.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of 3D species emitted by biomass burning.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define species emitted by biomass burning.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: PrecursorSpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of species emitted by lightning.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define species emitted by lightning.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: list of 3D species emitted by volcanoes.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define species emitted by volcanoes.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: PrescribedLowerBoundary
parameter.definition: List of species prescribed at the lower boundary.

parameter.name: PrescribedUpperBoundary
parameter.definition: List of species prescribed at the upper boundary.

component.name: AerosolModel
component.definition: Definition of component type AerosolModel required

parametergroup.name: General Attributes

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Which processes are included in the aerosol model?

parametergroup.parameter: Other model components coupled to the Aerosol model. This is covered more completely by the coupling archetecture in the questionnaire

parameter.name: GasPhasePrecursors
parameter.definition: List of gas phase aerosol precursors.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Definition of property name SchemeType required

parameter.name: Species
parameter.definition: List of species covered by the bulk scheme.

parameter.name: Framework
parameter.definition: Classification Framework: Single Moment classifies aerosols in terms of aerosol type e.g. biomass aerosol. Microphysical classifies aerosols in terms of size bins/modes.

value.name: single moment
value.definition: Aerosols classified in terms of aerosol type e.g. biomass aerosol.

parameter.value: Aerosols classified in terms of size bins/modes. Microphysical scheme resolves the composition rather than the type. Can have a mixture of aerosol components in a single bin/mode - so can have dust and sulphate in a single mode.

parameter.name: Species
parameter.definition: List of species covered by the modal scheme.

parameter.name: Framework
parameter.definition: Classification Framework: Single Moment classifies aerosols in terms of aerosol type e.g. biomass aerosol. Microphysical classifies aerosols in terms of size bins/modes.

value.name: single moment
value.definition: Aerosols classified in terms of aerosol type e.g. biomass aerosol.

parameter.value: Aerosols classified in terms of size bins/modes. Microphysical scheme resolves the composition rather than the type. Can have a mixture of aerosol components in a single bin/mode - so can have dust and sulphate in a single mode.

parameter.name: Species
parameter.definition: List of species covered by the bin scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: What type of aerosol scheme is used?

parameter.name: Framework
parameter.definition: Classification Framework: Single Moment classifies aerosols in terms of aerosol type e.g. biomass aerosol. Microphysical classifies aerosols in terms of size bins/modes.

value.name: single moment
value.definition: Aerosols classified in terms of aerosol type e.g. biomass aerosol.

parameter.value: Aerosols classified in terms of size bins/modes. Microphysical scheme resolves the composition rather than the type. Can have a mixture of aerosol components in a single bin/mode - so can have dust and sulphate in a single mode.

parameter.name: Species
parameter.definition: List of species covered by the scheme.
